text: Edward Evans Seabrook (June 6, 1899 – May 19, 1968) was an American screenwriter.Erickson p.385 ==Selected filmography== * Tanks a Million (1941) * Hay Foot (1942) * As You Were (1951) ==References== ==Bibliography== * Erickson, Hal. Military Comedy Films: A Critical Survey and Filmography of Hollywood Releases Since 1918. title: Edward E. Seabrook
